ADAlertRule.name: RDV Advance Alert

tab.identifier: Advance Transaction Version - Receipt Delivery Verification

ADAlertRule.filterClause: (((ad_user_id is not null and ad_user_id=@#AD_USER_ID@) or (ad_user_id is null)) And ((ad_role_id is not null and ad_role_id=@#AD_ROLE_ID@) or (ad_role_id is null)))

ADAlertRule.name: RDV Transaction Alert
ADAlertRule.filterClause: (((ad_user_id is not null and ad_user_id=@#AD_USER_ID@) or (ad_user_id is null)) And ((ad_role_id is not null and ad_role_id=@#AD_ROLE_ID@) or (ad_role_id is null)))
